Recommended Services

LampApps does not provide or suport these services. We recommend services we use or have otherwise found to be great value to anyone looking to manage a small business online, including hosting, SEO, credit card payment gateways, merchant services, Email, and website design.

G Suite

Google's G Suite includes Gmail and other Google services to help teams communicate. Simple to set up and manage.

Start Your Free Trial

Merchant Account

With free Authorize.net payment gateway. Accept credit cards online securely. Compatible with most shopping carts. No setup costs.

View Plans & Features

Shopping Cart

Ecwid seamlessly integrates into any website including Facebook. Manage your shop online and safely collect payments from customers.

View Plans & Features

Appointment Scheduling

SuperSasS is an online appointment scheduling system with integrated payment options. Schedule classes, meeting rooms, seminars, event registration, or just about anything.

View Plans & Features

Web Hosting Automation

WHMCS is the leading web hosting billing and automation platform including invoicing, customer management, knowledgebase, and help desk.

View Plans & Features

Web Design

Professional websites designs for any website. Themeforest is the largest global community of creative designers providing themes and templates that you can use to start your website.

View Plans & Features

Note

LampApps does not provide or support these services. In some cases LampApps is an affiliate and will receive compensation if you sign up and pay for their service. However, LampApps places quality and value of the services above any compensation LampApps may receive.

LampApps goal is to provide you the resources and tools to create a professional online presence at a low cost. Recommendations of products or services are based on our experience using these products/services or research. LampApps does not provide or support any products or services. However, LampApps may be an affiliate of these companies and may receive compensation if you pay for their products or services. LampApps places quality and value of the services we recommend above any compensation we may receive.
